Michael Romanoff https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Romanoff 0 Harry F. Gerguson (born Hershel Geguzin, February 20, 1890 – September 1, 1971), known as Michael Romanoff, was a Hollywood restaurateur, conman, and actor born in Lithuania. He is perhaps best known as the owner of the now-defunct Romanoff's, a Beverly Hills restaurant popular with Hollywood stars in the 1940s and 1950s. Harry_F._Gerguson ( born Hershel_Geguzin , February_20_,_1890 – September_1_,_1971 ) , known as Michael_Romanoff , was a_Hollywood_restaurateur , conman , and actor born in Lithuania . He is_perhaps_best_known as the_owner of the_now-defunct_Romanoff 's , a_Beverly_Hills_restaurant_popular with Hollywood_stars in the_1940s_and_1950s .
